refnamediv.refpurpose: Remove files from XML Storage System Directory

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This method is used for removing files from the repository.

refsect2.title: email
refsect2.para: For user identification, this should be a valid email account.

refsect2.title: password
refsect2.para: The MD5 hash of the password.

refsect2.title: relativepathList
refsect2.para:
Array of strings of paths relative to the <user home>/blog
folder in WebDAV to be deleted.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: This method returns a structure as follows:
refsect1.programlisting: 'flError' boolean 0 success, 1 fault 'message' string fault message (can be used to handle error cases) 'errorList' array of string contains a list of errors corresponding to files which cannot be removed. Successfully deleted files have an empty string.

example.title: Using the XML Storage System to Delete Multiple Files
example.para: Simple example of removing a file.
